data.name: The Little Star Spirit
data.detailed_description:
There is a beautiful star constellation, called „The Fox constellation“, which belongs to a tiny, but powerful star spirit. Unfortunately, the constellation gets destroyed by a terribly devastating asteroid shower. Due to that catastrophe, the stars of the constellation have been scattered all over different worlds. Deprived of its home, the little star spirit has no other chance but starting his journey towards foreign realms, where it has never been before, in order to find the stars and to rebuild its home to former glory.

DISCOVER NEW REALMS

Travel to colourful planets and visit worlds, where no-one has been before.

MEET AND DIE

Be aware of the creatures, you meet on your way. Not all of them are as harmless as they look like!

COLLECT

Find stars to let your destroyed home shine in new splendour.

BE ADVENTUROUS

Explore your environment thoroughly. There is more life and possibility for interaction than it may appear at first sight.

COLOURFUL FUSION

Classical platformer game mechanics meets bright vector graphics

MUSIC

Enjoy an orchestral soundtrack, composed by AmadelliMusic combined with selected environment sounds.

MEMORIES FROM THE BEFORE TIMES

An homage to our favourite genre from childhood, wrapped in an artsy style

data.short_description: Take on the challenge and start your journey to unexplored realms. Meet foreign creatures, be aware of traps and find all the stars, that got lost after the star constellation of the fox was destroyed. Rebuild the little Star Spirit’s home to former glory and let it shine brighter than before.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

data.legal_notice: The Little Star Spirit Copyright Vanessa Deeg & Anja Jesske GbR aka. Artsy Vulpini. All rights reserved.
